name: Project of Web Application course at Politecnico of Turin
intro: Website of Survey management in React Bootstrap, handling fontend and backend
teachings: Course with group laboratories and individual project that taught me to work collaboratively with other people directly on Visual Studio with Live Share. In summary I learned to develop web interfaces via React - Bootstrap and Javascript, but I also obtained a base of the backend, writing and then recalling the various functions with API and reading the data by interrogating an SQL database.
